sentences.en: Astronomical research began to spread over the whole range of electromagnetic waves.
sentences.cn: 天文研究开始向整个电磁波谱范围延拓.

sentences.en: Both variable orifices and electromagnetic controllers have been used with success.
sentences.cn: 可变锐孔和电磁流量控制器都已成功地使用.

sentences.en: Callahan posits that chemical elements radiate electromagnetic signals.
sentences.cn: 卡拉汉假定化学元素放射电磁信号。

sentences.en: Compton scattering can't be understood on the basis of classical electromagnetic theory.
sentences.cn: 康普顿散射不能根据经典电磁理论去理解.

sentences.en: Electromagnetic theory was able to predict the mechanism of the reflection.
sentences.cn: 电磁理论能够推算出反射的作用过程.

sentences.en: Every body radiates heat in the form of electromagnetic waves.
sentences.cn: 每一物体都以电磁波的形式辐射热.

sentences.en: Her hypothesis concerns the role of electromagnetic radiation.
sentences.cn: 她的假说涉及到电磁辐射的作用.

sentences.en: It is roughly 100 times stronger than the electromagnetic interaction.
sentences.cn: 它大体上比电磁相互作用强100倍.

sentences.en: Manned'stationary'satellites are used to relay and broadcast electromagnetic communication signals.
sentences.cn: “固定不动的”人造卫星被用来转播及广播电磁通讯信号.

sentences.en: Maxwell's electromagnetic investigations were carried out in four stages.
sentences.cn: 麦克斯韦的电磁研究分为四个阶段.

sentences.en: Radar, light, and other electromagnetic waves transfer momentum and energy through space.
sentences.cn: 雷达 、 光和其它形式的电磁波将其动量和能量通过空间输送出去.

sentences.en: Some people are worried that electromagnetic fields from electric power lines could increase the risk of cancer.
sentences.cn: 有些人担心输电线的电磁场可能增加致癌几率。

sentences.en: The electric and magnetic fields have been amalgamated into electromagnetic field tensor.
sentences.cn: 电场和磁场合并为电磁场张景.

sentences.en: The electromagnetic spectrum covers an enormous range of frequencies and energies.
sentences.cn: 电磁波谱包括极大的频率和能量范围.

sentences.en: With this idea the modern notion of the electromagnetic field was born.
sentences.cn: 紧接着这种见解的出现,关于电磁场的现代观念随之诞生.

words.tran_cn: 电磁体，[电] 电磁铁；电磁石

phrases.tran_cn: 电磁感应，电磁效应；感应电流；电磁离合器

trans.tran_en: relating to both electricity and magnetism, or having both electrical and magnetic qualities
